name: 黃子坤
objective:
介紹人機互動之分析、規劃和設計。
本課程運用認知心理學與心智模型相關理論來解釋與分析電腦介面使用者之環境知覺與互動，藉此得以改善人機互動之品質與效率。
同樣的知識與經驗亦可應用於環境與產品之實體介面分析與設計。
This course aims to study user's intuitive perception about their own acts and their surrounding world by employing knowledge of cognitive psychology and mental model that help shape behavior and set an approach to solving problems in design. 
Case studies and practice will be carried out with illustration and discussions.
schedule:
A.　　Introduction to Human-Computer Interaction
B.　　Intuitive Perception
C.　　Mental Models
D.　　Evaluation and Comparing Interfaces
E.　　User Experience
F.　　Heuristics
G.　　Measurement of Performance
H.　　Iterative Design
scorePolicy:

服務與出勤　　　　20%
materials:
Norman, Don(2009). The Design of Future Things. Basic Books.
Nielsen, Jakob (1994), Usability Engineering. Morgan Kaufmann Publishers.
